title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 700.14 - Construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 700.14 - Construction

State Regulations

This Part shall be liberally construed to further the general
purposes stated in section
186
of the Correction Law and the special
purposes of the particular provisions involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
700.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
